fields.name: Prometheans
fields.description: Self-determination is what makes us human! Society functioned just fine until it was manipulated by occult forces. We must bring back the old ways of democracy and economic freedom!

fields.name: Architechs
fields.description: You are certain that humans emotions stand in the way of efficient and durable administration of a society. Your individuality is guaranteed by giving the task of government to an A.I.

fields.name: Edenites
fields.description: You aim to be part of a super-organism composed of all of Earth's biosphere. Human Civilization can only survive by evolving past the individual.
